Text:
nice job, 2040.

however, is this a proper copy? it's like every few seconds the picture would stop, then get messy, followed by the disappearance of audio.

am i the only one experiencing this? i'm using vlc, by the way.

thanks, man.

@tyrone69: Everything plays fine in VLC, in WMP, in mplayer, in KMplayer - in short: in everything I have. Check and double-check your system, maybe you should try with restart/reboot. Do not raise questions which sounds alarming to other people, who may think that is something wrong with my work.

ah, sorry, dude. some douche at home stopped my download at 98%.

sorry, dude. no hard feelings.
